caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. DEONTREY D.

opinion.opinion_text:
COA: 213643, Wayne CC: 97-010510.
On order of the Court, the delayed application for leave to appeal from the June 16, 2000, decision of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
